title: ISicily 030281
support: A bronze disk, cut out from what was presumably originally a quadrangular plaque, of diameter 7.2 cm (Robert).

layout.p: The extent/layout of the text is unknown, since the disc was cut out of the original text.

date._: Later first century BCE? (presumably after 46 BCE, given reference to municipium).

provenanceFound._: Purchased by Hartung near Gavignano, in October 1846, where it was apparently also found, although this remains uncertain (see Kajava 2014: 208 for full discussion)

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana
